title: SBF Trial Prosecution Previews the Witnesses It Plans to Call
description: The government alerted the court that it will present testimony from FTX customers, investors, and unnamed co-conspirators to make their case against Sam Bankman-Fried.

title: Does the public understand the risks with banks?
description: Mainstream media is full of crypto scams and how regulators want to deal with them. However, no mainstream media outlet covers the risks of banks.

title: Hacked Nigerian crypto platform Patricia raises new funds amid customer outrage — can they win back trust?
description: Nigeria-focused crypto platform Patricia has moved aggressively to secure funding to quell the dissatisfaction among its user base. Weeks after admitting to a loss of $2 million worth of customer assets due to a cyberattack last year, the firm aims to use fresh capital to refund its aggrieved customers. However, trust seems to be in ... Read more

title: FTX Exploiter Strikes Again a Day After Moving Millions in Ether
description: The FTX accounts drainer has once again siphoned off another 7,500 ETH, equivalent to $12.62 million, linked to last year’s apparent manipulation of the FTX exchange. That marks the second movement of ether from a wallet associated with the FTX exploiter after approximately 2,500 ETH, valued at slightly over $4 million, was moved yesterday after ... Read more

title: Uniswap Price Prediction 2023-2032: Will UNI Keep Steady?
description: Uniswap Price Prediction 2023-2032 For anyone considering the switch from centralized finance (CeFi) to decentralized finance (DeFi), here’s a thought: Why do we constantly update the Uniswap Price Prediction?
